DOC.detailed_description: All patient go vaginal surgery genital prolapse , stage 3-4 , cystocele , rectocele uterine cervix prominent vagina . These patient , sign informed consent , vaginal pessary insert end operation stay 4 week post-op . After 4 week pessary remove , patient follow 2 year , recurrence prolapse .
